R. 
The SMGL initiative also led to improvements 
in perinatal outcomes. The PMR decreased in 
both countries, suggesting improvements in 
the quality of obstetric care at delivery. This 
conclusion was further substantiated in Uganda, 
where the fresh stillbirth rate decreased by 27%. 
Perinatal data for both Uganda and Zambia 
showed
  Decreases in overall rates of perinatal 
mortality.
  Decreases in total stillbirth mortality.
Another achievement was improved 
processes for identification,
